update.releaseNotes:
v2.3.0 - Changelog
New --- - Added proper 720p support. - Added a setting to enable Debug Mode. - Added support for the new Characters: Matikanefukukitaru (Full Armor), Hishi Akebono. - Added support for the new Support Cards: SSR Friendship Riko Kashimoto, SSR Power Rice Shower, SSR Stamina Mihono Bourbon, SSR Guts Twin Turbo, SSR Intelligence Biwa Hayahide, SSR Stamina Silence Suzuka.
Changed --- - Applied decimal formatting to the string comparison scores. - Prints out information about the device's display at the start. - Changed image asset for shifting.
